original_text: Just as it pleased the Lord to make you prosper and increase in number, so it will please him to ruin and destroy you. You will be uprooted from the land you are entering to possess.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희에게 선을 행하시고 너희를 번성하게 하시기를 기뻐하시던 것 같이 이제는 여호와께서 너희를 망하게 하시며 멸하시기를 기뻐하시리니 너희가 들어가 차지할 땅에서 뽑힐 것이요

sentences.original_text: Just as it pleased the Lord
to make you prosper and increase in number
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 번성하게 하고 번성하게 하심과 같이

sentences.original_text: You will be uprooted from the land
